author: Jeannette Neumann
title: Spanish Jobless Claims Rise by Most on Record in March
description: The number of Spaniards filing for jobless claims surged in March, the latest example of how the coronavirus pandemic is upending people’s livelihoods around the world.
content:
A pedestrian walks past a closed tapas bar, left, and restaurant in Madrid, on March 16.
